body.section:
Application to import cross references from external databases:
UniProt-SwissProt_ xrefs are retrieved from Kraken using the remoting API. DE lines are searched in SwissProt for active EC numbers in IntEnz.
GO: xrefs are retrieved from GO schema tables, where a cross reference to the EC classification exists.
The import is done usually just before every IntEnz release, roughly every month.
